metadata.title: Require Authentication for Single-User Mode
metadata.description: The requirement for a password to boot into single-user mode should be configured correctly.

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Tests the value of the SINGLE variable in the /etc/sysconfig/init file, to ensure that a password must be entered to access single user mode it should be set as 'SINGLE=/sbin/sulogin'. The init file provides further documentation on the configuration of this setting.
